targets.query: SELECT 100 - mean("usage_idle") FROM "cpu" WHERE host =~ /$host/ and region =~ /$region/ and pod =~ /$pod/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host fill(null)
SELECT mean("used_percent") FROM "disk" WHERE host =~ /$host/ AND pod =~ /$pod/ AND "region" =~ /^$region/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", "path" fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean("packets_recv"), 1s) FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$host/ AND pod =~ /$pod/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean("packets_sent"), 1s) FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$host/ AND pod =~ /$pod/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("outstanding_requests") FROM "zookeeper" WHERE "service" =~ /zookeeper/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("avg_latency") FROM "zookeeper" WHERE "service" =~ /zookeeper/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("approximate_data_size") FROM "zookeeper" WHERE "service" =~ /zookeeper/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("ephemerals_count") FROM "zookeeper" WHERE "service" =~ /zookeeper/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("max_file_descriptor_count") FROM "zookeeper" WHERE "service" =~ /zookeeper/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("max_latency") FROM "zookeeper" WHERE "service" =~ /zookeeper/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("min_latency") FROM "zookeeper" WHERE "service" =~ /zookeeper/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("num_alive_connections") FROM "zookeeper" WHERE "service" =~ /zookeeper/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("open_file_descriptor_count") FROM "zookeeper" WHERE "service" =~ /zookeeper/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean("packets_received"), 1s) FROM "zookeeper" WHERE "service" =~ /zookeeper/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean("packets_sent"), 1s) FROM "zookeeper" WHERE "service" =~ /zookeeper/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("watch_count") FROM "zookeeper" WHERE "service" =~ /zookeeper/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("znode_count") FROM "zookeeper" WHERE "service" =~ /zookeeper/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("synced_followers") FROM "zookeeper" WHERE "service" =~ /zookeeper/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("pending_syncs") FROM "zookeeper" WHERE "service" =~ /zookeeper/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("followers") FROM "zookeeper" WHERE "service" =~ /zookeeper/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)

list.name: pod
list.query: show tag values from zookeeper with key = "pod" where region =~ /$region/

list.name: host
list.query: show tag values from cassandraClientRequest with key = "host" where region =~ /$region/
